Dealer module

class Dealer.Dealer[source]

Bases: Player.Player

The Dealer class inherits from the class:Player abstract base class.

Returns

Returns a new instance of the Dealer

Return type

:class`Dealer`

think()[source]

Think is called on an instance of Dealer and abstracts the Dealer logic to be used in play_round. The Dealer logic is forced to hit so long as the hand score is less than or equal to 17.

Returns

True if Dealer hits, False if Dealer stands

Return type

: boolean
